title: GATE 2025: Registration Open!
content: The deadline to register without a late fee is **September 26, 2024**.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to secure your spot in the exam.
image_desc: A colorful image of a graduation cap with a ribbon that says "GATE 2025" on it.
narration: Hey future engineers! Get ready to take on the challenge of GATE 2025. Registration is now open, and you don't want to miss out on this chance to secure your spot in the exam. The deadline to register without a late fee is September 26, 2024. So, make sure you apply now and get ready to ace the exam!

title: How to Register for GATE 2025
content: **Step 2:** Fill out the application form with all the required information.
image_desc: A computer monitor displaying a web page with a GATE 2025 registration form.
narration: To register for GATE 2025, follow these simple steps. First, access the GATE login portal. Then, fill out the application form with all the required information. Next, pay the exam fee. Finally, upload the required documents. It's that easy!

title: Important Dates to Remember
image_desc: A calendar with the late fee deadline and exam dates highlighted.
narration: Remember these important dates. The late fee deadline is October 7, 2024. So, make sure you register before then to avoid paying extra. The exam will be held on February 1, 2, 15, and 16, 2025. Mark your calendars and start preparing!

title: Eligibility and Fees
content: - For detailed information on eligibility criteria and exam fees, please refer to the full article.
image_desc: A hand holding a smartphone with the GATE 2025 website open on it.
narration: For detailed information on eligibility criteria and exam fees, please refer to the full article. You can find all the information you need on the GATE 2025 website.

title: Good Luck!
content: - We wish you all the best in your GATE 2025 preparation!
image_desc: A group of students studying together with books and laptops.
narration: We wish you all the best in your GATE 2025 preparation! Remember to stay focused, study hard, and believe in yourself. We are confident that you will succeed. Good luck!
